product_name: Horny Toad Coriander Pants- Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Velvety and soft, the women's mid-wale-corduroy Coriander Pants from Horny Toad spice up your wardrobe with irresistable comfort. Cotton/polyester corduroy pants have spandex added for easy stretch. Fabric is cross-dyed for visual depth. Zip fly with button closure. Front drop-in pockets with metal rivets; side coin pocket; back patch pockets. Horny Toad Coriander Pants for women feature narrow straight-leg styling. Closeout.
short_description: Velvety and soft, the women's mid-wale-corduroy Coriander Pants from Horny Toad spice up your wardrobe with irresistable comfort.
